content:
Get your sexy ass down to Ljubljana's hottest festival! Dance to top DJs for 2DAYS&2NIGHTS, sexy house / electro / minimal music, cocktails by the pool with a cute guy or a girl you’ve just met when playing beach volleyball for the prize of 1000€! ... btw, have u seen a movie called Project X? Just asking There’s some serious fun coming up!!!

Festival place LAGUNA MESTNA PLAŽA is offering you: swimming pools ✦ cocktail bars ✦ beach volleyball courts ✦ tree shadows ✦ big stage with day and night DJs and animation ✦ big grass field ✦ sun beds&umbrellas ✦ camping ✦ rooms ✦ parking ✦ MUSIC
 
 FACEBOOK: Beach'n'NITE 


 
	

	
	
		
		

		
			
		
		
	


	
		
	


[/URL][/img] 

LINE UP ▶ ▶ ▶

FRIDAY 13th 

DJ MAJ ✦ /Slovenia/ Resident@club Cirkus
DJ MANUEL DARK ✦ /Slovenia/ Resident@club Cirkus

FRENKIE HEADFORS ✦ ✦ ✦ /Croatia/
]Resident@Papaya, Zræe beach


[URL='http://soundcloud.com/club-papaya/frankie-headfors-papaya[/url']]http://soundcloud.com/club-papaya/frankie-headfors-papaya[/url]

GLOWINTHEDARK ✦ ✦ ✦ ✦ /Netherlands/ 
Electro dude "PROJECT X"
Ministry of Sound, Pacha, Paradiso, Blue Marlin, etc.

 
	
		
	

SATURDAY 14th

DJ MANUEL DARK ✦ /Slovenia/ Resident@club Cirkus
DJ MAJ ✦ /Slovenia/ -Resident@club Cirkus

JOSH SOMEN ✦ ✦ /Slovenia/ - Resident@Askari club

MARC BUCCA ✦ ✦ ✦ /Croatia/
Zagreb's most wanted DJ
Shamballa, Hacienda, Aquarius, Gallery, etc.

[URL='http://soundcloud.com/marcbucca[/url']]http://soundcloud.com/marcbucca[/url]

DJ SEXATION ✦ ✦ ✦ ✦ /Russia/ 
DJ official PLAYBOY Portugal 
Nikki Beach Marabella, Byblos, Casablanca-Rose club, etc.

 <iframe width="420" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/8BQ1ZxgWLQQ" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe> 

ENTRANCE:

2 DAYS
Early bird: 19€ until 30.6. / limited amount only
Regular: 25€ until 8.7.
VIP area: 30€ until 8.7.
Extra VIP: 50€ open bar 7.30pm-9pm

1 DAY (entrance @ 7pm)
Early bird: 8€ until 30.6. / limited amount only
Regular: 11€ until 8.7.
VIP area: 16€ until 8.7.
Extra VIP: 30€ open bar 7.30pm-9pm

(open bar includes all drinks available at the festival)

 
	

	
	
		
		

		
		
	


	
		
	


[/URL][/img] 

ONLINE TICKET: www.eventim.si
Hiše vstopnic (Hala Tivoli, Citypark, Europark, CitycenterKino Šiška, Križanke)

OTHER TICKET OUTLETS: Petrol, Pošte, Big Bang, K kioski, Kompas, 3 dva trafike, Mercator Hipermarketi, M holidays in Alpetour.


BEACH VOLLEYBALL TOURNAMENT (1st place wins 1000eur)
- there have to be 3 players in the team (at least one girl, for every additional girl the team gets one point head start)
- it's allowed to have one spear player, however there has to be one girl at least on the field at all times
NOT ALLOWED TO PLAY: 
- top 64 MALE and top 32 FEMALE registered beach volleyball players at OZS
- registered MALE players of 1st, 2nd, 3rd league and FEMALE players of 1st league of IN-DOOR volleyball
APPLICATIONS & INFO: info@beachandnite.info
____________________________________________________________

DJ CONTEST:
Send us your set of maximum length of 30mins and we'll choose the best 10. We'll give you the chance to show your talent to the larger audience and if you win, there is nice reward from our sponsors waiting for you! The winner will also get to play his set in the prime time of the evening!
APPLICATIONS & INFO: info@beachandnite.info


CAMPING & ROOMS - 15% discount with a festival bracelet 
T: + 386 (0)1 568 39 13
E: ljubljana.resort@gpl.si
www.ljubljanaresort.si

LAGUNA MESTNA PLAŽA: www.laguna.si/

PARKING
